product_name: CamelBak Scout Hydration Pack - 50 fl. oz. - Kids'
long_description: The kids' CamelBak Scout hydration pack gives your child the pride of self-sufficiency and keeps them happily hydrated on outdoor adventures. Updated 50 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features an extremely durable, low-profile design and wide Air-light mouth that seals with an easy quarter turn. Pack stays light with just the right capacity for an extra layer of clothing, snacks and gear. Fully adjustable and comfortable suspension is designed to fit a child's frame; sized for ages 5 - 10 years. Wicking mesh back panel keeps a kid comfortable and cool; sternum strap includes an integrated whistle. Taste-free, polyethylene-lined drink tube features a Big Bite(TM) valve placed for convenient use. Closed-cell insulation encases the reservoir to keep liquids cool for hours. The CamelBak Scout hydration pack features reflective highlights that increase a child's visibility in low-light conditions.
short_description: The kids' CamelBak Scout hydration pack gives your child the pride of self-sufficiency and keeps them happily hydrated on outdoor adventures.
